includes
    string
    string_view
    GUIMacOS-Swift.h

functions
    void setupMenuBar() -> GUIMacOS::setupMenuBar()
    void addWindowMenuItem(std::string_view name) -> GUIMacOS::addWindowMenuItem(std::string{ name })
    void removeWindowMenuItem(std::string_view name) -> GUIMacOS::removeWindowMenuItem(std::string{ name })
    void addServerMenuItem(std::string_view name) -> GUIMacOS::addServerMenuItem(std::string{ name })
    void removeServerMenuItem(std::string_view name) -> GUIMacOS::removeServerMenuItem(std::string{ name })
